Description: Fragment of sub-round handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Matrodoros. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0698.18.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (189)
